law.catch_line: Encouragement of state-local and interlocal cooperation.
law.text: The Commission shall encourage state-local and interlocal cooperation by formulating proposals for, and by facilitating the enactment of statutes and the adoption of administrative agreements to give departments and agencies of the Commonwealth and the local governmental units of the Commonwealth broad authority to enter into intergovernmental agreements, contracts and compacts.
law.history: Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 3, effectiveJune 16, 1966.
